-- 标签以及值 SELECT al.name, getName.all_count as value FROM ( -- 最多文章的四个标签 SELECT rs.label_id, rs.all_count FROM ( -- 根据标签ID分组查询汇总 SELECT temp_rs.label_id, SUM(temp_rs.num) as all_count FROM ( -- 配合标签ID和单位列 SELECT article_map_label.label_id, 1 as num FROM ( -- 用户所属文章 SELECT uma.article_id FROM user_map_article uma WHERE uma.user_id = #{userId} -- 用户所属文章结束 ) article_id_list LEFT JOIN article_map_label ON article_id_list.article_id
WHERE article_id_list.article_id = article_map_label.article_id -- 配合标签ID和单位列结束 ) temp_rs GROUP BY temp_rs.label_id -- 根据标签ID分组查询汇总结束 ) rs ORDER BY rs.all_count DESC limit 4 -- 最多文章的四个标签结束 ) getName LEFT JOIN article_label al ON getName.label_id = al.id -- 标签以及值结束
